sn22.118:1.3: rupam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassatha”ti?
sn22.118:1.6: Rupam, bhikkhave, ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.118:1.10: vinnanam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassatha”ti?
